@description.name: @description
@description.body: Responsible class for everything concerning styles without the need of an element. If you want to query or modify styles of HTML elements, take a look at {@link qx.bom.element.Style}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Internal lookup table to map property names to CSS names

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A reference to the native CSS.supports function (supportsCSS in Opera)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the name of a style property and returns the name the browser uses for its implementation, which might include a vendor prefix.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: propertyName {String} Style property name to check

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} The supported property name or null if not supported
@return.description: The supported property name or null if not supported

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Takes the name of a JavaScript style property and returns the corresponding CSS name. The name of the style property is taken as is, i.e. it gets not extended by vendor prefixes. The conversion into the CSS name is done by string manipulation, not involving the DOM. Example: 

qx.bom.Style.getCssName("MozTransform");

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects CSS support by using the native CSS.supports function or by applying a style to a DOM element of the given type and verifying the result. Also checks for vendor-prefixed variants of the value, e.g. "linear-gradient" -> "-webkit-linear-gradient". Returns the (possibly vendor-prefixed) value if successful or null if the property and/or value are not supported.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} element to be used for the detection
@param.description: element to be used for the detection

@param.name: @param
@param.body: propertyName {String} the style property to be tested
@param.description: the style property to be tested

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} style property value to be tested
@param.description: style property value to be tested

@param.name: @param
@param.body: prefixed {Boolean?} try to determine the appropriate vendor prefix for the value. Default: true
@param.description: try to determine the appropriate vendor prefix for the value. Default: true

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} prefixed style value or null if not supported
@return.description: prefixed style value or null if not supported
